subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks can take solace in the fact that several N.B.A. teams have recovered from an 11-22 record, or worse, to make the playoffs. But they didn’t get far.
snippet: The Knicks can take solace in the fact that several N.B.A. teams have recovered from an 11-22 record, or worse, to make the playoffs. But they didn’t get far.
